Today one of the machines in the factory I work at blew up while I was in the toilet, I heard the bang from my stall where I was taking a dump and the fire alarms started going off. The whole factory has burned down once before in a fire and we have a plaque over the entrance to honour the people who died at that time. While i'm sat there with my trousers around my ankles and the remains of dinners past smearing my rear I became acutely aware of two things:

1. I would rather burn alive in that toilet taking the time to clean myself up and wash my hands than waddle out into the street with my trousers round my ankles, or else pull said trousers up into the squidgy hellscape that was my rectum before fleeing for my life.
2. I had to review this game before I died.

The most popular worst horror game in existence.

Now understand, as of writing this review I have over 2,400 hours in the game playing as both killer and survivor. The game is utter trash, the game is poorly written, the community toxic and the servers complete garbage. When you play as killer, you'll get nothing but 3-4 man survive with friend groups especially at lower ranks, and as survivor, you'll get sweaty killers, hell bent on getting a 4k even if it means selling their soul to Satan or tunneling/camping you off the hook. BHVR will CONSTANTLY put out garbage updates, all wrapped around cosmetics that no one asks for, in the hopes you'll continue to pay for this game instead of putting it out of it's misery. Let me give you the highlights of it:

1:) The game is so poorly written you'll get frustrated on how bad it is.
2:) Hackers are a huge part of the game now, BHVR has made 0 steps to fix this.
3:) You will have players on both sides play the equivalent of a guy on COD sitting in the corner with an RPG, then claim after the match that they played well.
4:) dumbass cosmetics that no one asked for, nor does the game need to focus on. 

So if you are in the market for a frustrating, money sink that doesn't bother to fix bugs or balance gameplay, DBD is just for you!

追記
2022年7月20日にアップデートがありキラーのアッパー調整が入りました。
今までサバイバー超有利環境から少しだけ有利でサバイバー達に余裕が無くなりました。
その結果どうなったかと言うと今まで多く居たサバイバーが少なくなりキラー過多になりました。
この事実から分かる事はプレーヤーの大半が勝ち馬に乗りたいだけの軟弱な精神の持ち主ばかりだという事が分かります。
この手の人々は性格が陰湿な傾向がありますので、このゲームの民度の低さがお分かりになるでしょう。

まともにサバイバーをするには現在は非推奨行為ですが外部ツールのVCに頼らざるを得ない環境になっています。
バランス調整が下手な運営ですのでストレスを溜めたくない方は他のゲームをお勧めします。
バグも多くインディーズゲーらしい完成度なのかなって思います。

ここから過去レビュー
キラーとサバイバーの人口比率が歪でサバイバーをプレイしようとすると何分も待たされます。平均5分～10分待ちます。
この時間が無駄じゃないですか？暇なニートや無職や勉強してない学生なら良いのかも知れませんが
仕事してる社会人だったら無駄以外の何物でもありませんね。

対してキラーは低ランク帯（白～黄色）は3分ほど待ちますがマッチ成立は速めです。緑帯以上はほぼ待つことは無いでしょう。
どうしてそのような状況かは他の方も書いている通り、キラープレーヤーが少ないからです。
その理由はキラープレイは異常に狭い視野で足元にサバイバーが居ても見えないほどです（笑）

しかもサバイバーより直線スピード以外はすべて行動が遅く、行動する度に視線を強制的に動かされてサバイバーを見失うように設計されています。板壊し、窓越えなど
なので永遠に追いつかない場所も多く存在しています。慣れたサバイバーはそういった場所を確実に使ってくるのでキラープレーはストレスが溜まります。

サバイバーはパーティープレイヤーが多く、そのほとんどがボイスチャット（VC）を使用しています。
このゲームはVC使用を前提に作られていませんのでVC使用によってバランスが崩壊しています。
VCは外部ツールですので反則行為なのに運営が手を打っていないため、不利過ぎる状況によりキラーが圧倒的に不利になっています。

それに加えて度重なるキラーのナーフで残っていたキラープレイヤーもどんどん少なくなってきています。
さらにサバイバー側がVCを使って有利な立場から煽り行為などをする者が多く存在していて
それに対するペナルティーや通報（あるが機能してない）も無いので見限って辞めていく人が後を絶たない状態です。

先日メメントモリが弱体化され更にキラープレイヤーが減りました。今後もキラーを弱体化する予定との事ですので
「キラープレイをしてみたい」と思う方は考え直した方が良いかと思います。

This game, is not worth your time. The game play is simple and repetitive. Find the generators, activate them. Find the exit, leave. As the survivor all you have to do is run away from the hunter, while you fix the generators. As the hunter you use your abilities and attacks to get to the survivors, but that's so to speak it. 
And I am not sure if I am the only one having this issue but loading into games takes a long time also.

Playing survivor can be fun by yourself, but if you are playing with friends or the killer is bad at the game then it is/can be fun. Playing killer is very hard at first but once you get some game sense and figure some things out then it is very much worth it and is a lot of fun. Also if you get this game expecting not to be tilted ,well, good luck. Also if you are playing the killer very well and kill every body then the survivors might get tilted and leave  you an angry message in the post game chat. So this is how i think of the game, If anybody else has something else to say/add then be my guest and post a comment. See you in the Fog!

Domuz pirzolası, domuz bonfile veya domuz rostosu için tarifleri seçerseniz, bugünün domuz eti 15 veya 20 yıl önce domuz eti daha yağsız olduğunu unutmayın. Çoğu domuz eti kesimi, tavuk baldırından veya bacağından daha az yağ ve kolesterol içerir; Bu kesikler domuzun sırtından veya sırtından gelir.

Et, pembe ve sert olmalıdır, beyaz yağın kesik kesikleri boyunca eşit olarak dağılır. Pişirmeden önce buzdolabınızda dört güne kadar buzdolabında, buzdolabında ve sıkıca sarılı halde tutabilirsiniz. Çiğ domuz altı aya kadar dondurulabilir ve bu tariflerden herhangi biri üç aya kadar iyice donar.
This game is an unique approach to multiplayer gaming, really fun with your friends (if you have any).
